sections.title: MBBS Admission in Bihar 2025-26, Colleges Seat Matrix, Fee Structure, Application process, cut-off and Counselling

content.content: Renowned as a premier destination for medical education in India, Bihar offers a plethora of undergraduate and postgraduate medical programs, drawing students from all corners of the nation. Admission to MBBS programs in Bihar is conducted through the NEET exam, with successful candidates participating in state counseling for enrollment.
The MBBS curriculum in Bihar spans 5.5 years, comprising 4.5 years of academic study and 1 year of compulsory internship, providing students with comprehensive training and practical experience.

In Bihar aspiring MBBS students have a variety of options available for admission. The state boasts both government and private medical colleges and universities. Typically, securing admission into government medical colleges is more competitive than private ones, resulting in higher cut-off marks for government institutions.

content.content: In Bihar there are total 21 Medical Colleges offers MBBS course and accepting NEET UG. Among, these 13 Govt. Medical Colleges (Include 1-AIIMS & 0-JIPMER), 8 are Private Medical Colleges.
There are total 2765 seats for Bihar MBBS. Amongst, 1615 Seats are reserve for Govt. Medical Colleges (Include AIIMS & JIPMER) and 1150 seats are reserve for Private Medical Colleges.

The NEET cutoff is determined based on various factors such as the number of applicants, the difficulty level of the exam, and the availability of seats in medical and dental colleges. It varies for different categories like General, OBC, SC, ST, and others. Each state and college may also have its own cutoff scores. Generally, higher cutoffs are seen in prestigious colleges and for popular courses. It’s crucial for aspiring medical students to keep track of cutoff trends and prepare accordingly

content.content: All the certificates included in the list given below, if applicable, must be submitted in original by every candidate at the time of his/ her counselling / allotment on the scheduled date

As per above table, the candidate has to pay the refundable security deposit through online mode only e.g. by Credit card/Debit Card/ Net Banking / UPI at the time of registration and submission of the application form. The candidate has also to pay processing charge in addition to Counselling / Registration Fee and Security Deposit for payment through online mode.

content.list:
• Original Admit Card of NEET(UG)-2025
  • Original Score Card of NEET(UG)-2025
  • Residential Certificate
  • Caste Certificate
  • All the Certificate / documents in original as per the requirements of admissions in Private Medical/Dental Colleges.
  • Six copies of the passport size photographs, which was pasted on the Admit Card of NEET(UG)-2025.
  • Downloaded print of Online filled Application Form (PartA&PartB) of UGMAC-2025.
  • Aadhar Card
  • Any other documents required (if any) suchasDQ (PH)/SMQ/EWS Certificate etc.

content.content: Q. How Many Private Medical colleges in Bihar?
Ans. Total 7 Private medical colleges are there in Bihar. Out of these 7 Colleges Katihar Medical college and Madhubani Medical colleges are Minority Medical colleges.
Q. Is out side Bihar Candidates Can Take Admission in Private medical college of Bihar?
Ans. Yes in Private medical colleges of Bihar Out side Bihar Candidates can Apply.
Q. What is the eligibility criteria for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?

Ans. The eligibility criteria for Bihar MBBS admission 2025 is that the applicant must have passed 10+2 with a minimum of 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Biotechnology and English. The applicant must have also cleared the NEET UG 2025 exam with a valid score.
Q. Is there any domicile requirement for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?
Ans. Yes, the applicant must be a permanent resident of Bihar. (For GOVT Colleges)
Q. Is there any age limit for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?
Ans. Yes, the candidate must be aged 17 years or above as on 31st December 2025.
Q. What is the application process for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?

Ans. The application process for Bihar MBBS admission 2025 is online. The candidates must fill the online application form available on the official website of the Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board.
Q. What documents are required for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?
Ans. The documents required for Bihar MBBS admission 2025 include NEET-UG Score Card, 10th and 12th Mark sheets, Caste Certificate, Domicile Certificate, Passport Sized Photographs, etc.
Q. What is the fee structure for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?
Ans. The fee structure for the medical colleges in Bihar differs from college to college. The candidates must check the fee structure of the college they are applying to.
Q. When will the counselling process for Bihar MBBS admission 2025 begin?
Ans. The counselling process for Bihar MBBS admission 2024 will begin after the declaration of NEET UG 2025 results. The exact dates will be announced later.
Q. What is the selection process for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?
Ans. The selection process for Bihar MBBS admission 2025 is based on the NEET UG 2025 score and rank. The applicants will be selected based on their merit.
Q. Is there any reservation criteria for Bihar MBBS admission 2025?

Ans. Yes, the reservation criteria for Bihar MBBS admission 2025 is based on the Government of India regulations. The reserved categories will get additional marks and relaxation in the cut-off marks.
